channel.title: Projects on Wenbo Lv
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Wenbo Lv

item.title: arcR
item.description: goal The goal of arcR is to integrate the benefits of R and ArcGIS with using ArcGIS in R. document You can see the document of arcR in here source code The source code of arcR is in here feedback If you have any questions or suggestions, please post them in arcR github repo issue.

item.title: esp
item.description: goal Assessing the spatial association between variables through an equivalent geographical detector q-statistic within a regression framework. document You can see the document of esp in here source code The source code of esp is in here feedback If you have any questions or suggestions, please post them in esp github repo issue.

item.title: gdverse
item.description: goal The goal of gdverse is to support the geodetector model and its variants. document You can see the document of gdverse in here source code The source code of gdverse is in here feedback If you have any questions or suggestions, please post them in gdverse github repo issue.

item.title: geocn
item.description: goal The goal of geocn is to provide various commonly used spatial data related to Chinese regions in the R programming environment. document You can see the document of geocn in here source code The source code of geocn is in here feedback If you have any questions or suggestions, please post them in geocn github repo issue.

item.title: geocomplexity
item.description: goal The goal of geocomplexity is to support geocomplexity computation and applications. document You can see the document of geocomplexity in here source code The source code of geocomplexity is in here feedback If you have any questions or suggestions, please post them in geocomplexity github repo issue.

item.title: geosom
item.description: goal The goal of geosom is to achieve Spatially-Aware Self-Organizing Maps(GeoSOM) Model in R. document You can see the document of geosom in here source code The source code of geosom is in here feedback If you have any questions or suggestions, please post them in geosom github repo issue.

item.title: sdsfun
item.description: goal The goal of sdsfun is to provide miscellaneous functions that summarize common operations of R packages (such as sf and terra packages) related to spatial data science. document You can see the document of sdsfun in here source code The source code of sdsfun is in here feedback If you have any questions or suggestions, please post them in sdsfun github repo issue.

item.title: spatbox
item.description: source code The source code of spatbox is in here feedback If you have any questions or suggestions, please post them in spatbox github repo issue.

item.title: spEcula
item.description: goal The goal of spEcula is to make it easier to use R for spatial prediction based on various spatial relationships (e.g.Â spatial dependence, spatial heterogeneity and geographical similarity). document You can see the document of spEcula in here source code The source code of spEcula is in here feedback If you have any questions or suggestions, please post them in spEcula github repo issue.

item.title: tidyrgeoda
item.description: goal The goal of tidyrgeoda is to provide an interface for rgeoda to integrate with sf objects and the tidyverse. document You can see the document of tidyrgeoda in here source code The source code of tidyrgeoda is in here feedback If you have any questions or suggestions, please post them in tidyrgeoda github repo issue.
